heldEvents.title: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud: Backbone of AWS
heldEvents.description: Learn how to launch, configure, and manage virtual servers with scalable, secure, and reliable applications. This workshop covers everything you need to know about setting up instances, managing storage and deploying applications on AWS's powerful platform.
